Name: Blazing Extinction VI
Desc:
Launches a compressed orb of superheated flame. The flaming orb of the Fire element travels forward, striking enemies within range with flaming corona.
Use with the Down key to activate Blazing Extinction - Fox mode. Lock the command to disable the Blazing Extinction - Fox mode when using this skill with the Down key.
Requires a Fire Lion.
Required Skill: Blazing Extinction Lv. 30 or higher
Command Lock: Right-click
